original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṁ bhikkhuṁ pañhaṁ pucchanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ anokāsa katam bhikkhum pañham pucchanti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṁ bhikkhuṁ pañhaṁ pucchissantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ anokāsa katam bhikkhum pañham pucchissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṁ bhikkhuṁ pañhaṁ pucchantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ anokāsa katam bhikkhum pañham pucchanti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṁ bhikkhuṁ pañhaṁ pucchissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ anokāsa katam bhikkhum pañham pucchissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī anokāsakataṁ bhikkhuṁ pañhaṁ puccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī anokāsa katam bhikkhum pañham puccheyya pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: suttante okāsaṁ kārāpetvā vinayaṁ vā abhidhammaṁ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: suttante okāsam kārāpetvā vinayam vā abhidhammam vā pucchati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Vinaye okāsaṁ kārāpetvā suttantaṁ vā abhidhammaṁ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: vinaye okāsam kārāpetvā suttantam vā abhidhammam vā pucchati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Abhidhamme okāsaṁ kārāpetvā suttantaṁ vā vinayaṁ vā pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: abhidhamme okāsam kārāpetvā suttantam vā vinayam vā pucchati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anāpucchite anāpucchitasaññā pañhaṁ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an āpucchite an āpucchita saññā pañham pucchati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anāpucchite vematikā pañhaṁ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an āpucchite vematikā pañham pucchati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Anāpucchite āpucchitasaññā pañhaṁ pucchati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: an āpucchite āpucchita saññā pañham pucchati āpatti pācittiyassa
āpucchite an āpucchita saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: anodissa okāsaṁ kārāpetvā yattha katthaci pucchati,
analyzed: an udissa okāsam kārāpetvā yattha katthaci pucchati
